Description: A flexible pipeline for genome-resolved metagenomic data analysis
EDAM_operations: Read binning, Sequence assembly, Genome annotation, Sequence trimming, Demultiplexing
EDAM_reduced_operations: Read binning, Sequence assembly, Genome annotation, Sequence trimming, Demultiplexing
EDAM_reduced_topics: Whole genome sequencing, Metagenomic sequencing, Metagenomics
EDAM_topics: Whole genome sequencing, Metagenomic sequencing, Metagenomics
bio.tool_description: MetaWRAP aims to be an easy-to-use metagenomic wrapper suite that accomplishes the core tasks of metagenomic analysis from start to finish: read quality control, assembly, visualization, taxonomic profiling, extracting draft genomes (binning), and functional annotation.
